text: Melanie Ann Amaro (born June 26, 1992) is an American singer. She won the first season of The X Factor USA in 2011. For winning, she got a $5 million recording contract with Syco Music and Epic Records. Amaro was also the youngest contestant to win the competition. title: Melanie Amaro
